channel.title: Two things that really bother me\don't make sense
channel.description:
1) I can understand the need to redesign On A Rail chapter, but why the hell was the end of the Surface Tension cut down? The use of Snark weapon in the garage, the introduction of those Xen jump pads and the big battle in the warehouse are just... gone?
2) Did I missed the Snarks in Questionable Ethics? Because I only found them at the end of ST which made no sense what so ever, from a gameplay point. I get them just before the fight with Garg?? I dropped down from that vent with Snarks in my hand, saw Garg and felt like a complete idiot, man.:fffuuu: Snarks are a great weapon against human grunts and than again, they don't attack aliens. So why do I get them AFTER the whole Surface Tension? I have no use for them in Forget About Freeman and later. Completely useless.
This mod is truly awesome, and more than just a mod, but these two things are really killing me! Is there any reason you did this? Was it intentional, or just overlooked?

item.title: Two things that really bother me\don't make sense
item.dc:creator: evilspleen1213
item.description:
Pyro:

As was discussed in another thread, the devs had to cut out all of ST from the vent to the garb in because a team member quit and they couldn’t finish it. The game does suffer from it; the lack of soldiers and aliens fighting really ruins the impression of the soldiers being beaten back.

Agreed. QE and Surface Tension were always my favorite part of the game. This rendition of ST is still great, but the cuts they made to it are felt pretty hard. Probably my biggest beef with the mod.

And yes, snarks are pretty useless now.
